QuestData.Title: Dressing With Class
QuestData.Description: Now stop right there. Look at you! You look like you just walked in off of the street. Where are your robes and hat?$b$bAnd don't tell me you've entered the academy without your wand and spellbook.$b$bFreshmen.$b$bPut yourself together, and maybe then I will consider letting you enter the academy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Nar'thalas Academy Hat, Robes, Wand, and Spellbook.
QuestData.CompletionText: Still trying to get into the academy, I see.
QuestData.RewardText: Your hat and robes don't match, but you still look better. I hardly recognize you.
